description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with strong day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

The Managed Innovation team within Sales Operations is focused on supporting our sales and operations teams by providing relevant data and insights. This is an exciting, fast moving and technical team that drives improved impact and performance from Google’s exceptional sales teams. Experts in driving process improvements and consistency, team members are analytical and strategic with a pragmatic sense of getting things done, while still delivering high quality and maintainable technical solutions.

The team is responsible for a wide range of special projects including prototyping features for the Google CRM system. Working globally with core product and engineering teams, we solve high impact business challenges with novel technical solutions, prototypes, and extensions to Google's CRM.

As a Tools Developer for the Managed Innovation team you will become an expert on how to deliver high quality technical solutions leveraging Google technologies through testable and maintainable code, working cross-functionally to deliver a variety of projects. Using your relationship-building and influencing skills, you will work with a range of teams across sales and marketing to meet user needs and bring efficiency to the business. You will develop and support prototypes and extensions to Google's CRM in support of the core product group. As a key member of a larger team focused on the strategy and design of internal products you will be ensure that our projects are part of a seamless experience for Googlers.

The Go-to-Market Operations (GtM) team ensures Google's complex and ever-evolving Ads business runs smoothly. We are instrumental in setting go-to-market strategy, and ensuring flawless execution and operations against the strategy. We have teams embedded in each of the major Ads business areas as well as global teams that work across the business areas. Team members are analytical and strategic, with a pragmatic sense of how to get things done.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • 3 years of programming experience in Java.
  • 2 years of experience coding in JavaScript/TypeScript and web application development experience with a front-end framework.
  • 2 years of software development/engineering experience

Preferred qualifications:

  • Graduate degree in a management, technical or engineering field
  • Experience in architecting, designing and developing backend databases
  • Proficiency in SQL across standard relational environments (e.g., Oracle, Teradata, MySQL, etc.).
  • Self-driven, ambitious and entrepreneurial.
responsibilities:
• Develop internal web applications in Angular and Java
  • Architect and design high quality apps to solve business needs
  • Undertake analysis on usage to generate insight for core product teams
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with cross-functional global business leaders to understand the needs of the business and create efficiencies with technical solutions
  • Work independently and as part of the development team to prioritize multiple stakeholders and tasks, and manage work time efficiently
title: Full Stack Developer, Prototypes and Tools
